session-node.tooltip:
Allowable Input Node:
(1) No inputs OR
(2) Data (to extract variables)
Also (to extract a graph) any of these:
Search, PM, IM, Estimator, Updator

Allowable Input Node:
(1) Search OR
(2) Graph

Allowable Input Node:
(1) Graph, OR
(2) Graph AND Data (to extract discrete categories)
Also (to extract a PM) any of these:
IM, Estimator

Allowable Input Node:
(1) PM (Bayes or SEM), OR
(2) IM (to convert Dirichlet Bayes IM to Bayes IM), OR
(3) Estimator (to extract IM)

Allowable Input Node:
(1) No inputs (standalone data set), OR
(2) IM (Bayes or SEM, to simulate data)

model.name: Replace Missing Values with Column Mode
Replace Missing Values with Column Mean
Replace Missing Values with Regression Predictions
Replace Missing Values by Extra Category

session-node.tooltip:
Allowable Input Notes:
(1) Data, OR
(2) Data Manipulation Node

Allowable Input Combinations:
(1) PM and Data, OR
(2) IM and Data (shortcut for IM->PM + Data)

Allowable Input Nodes:
(1) Data (Continous or Discrete), OR
(2) Graph (searches directly over graph) OR
(3) for struct EM: Discrete Data + Bayes PM

Allowable Input Combinations:
(1) IM (Bayes only) + Data (discrete only)

Allowable Input Combinations:
(1) Search AND Graph
(2) Graph (reference) and Graph (target)

Allowable Input Combination:
(1) Search (FCI) AND Data (continuous)
